document_data.name: The Shadow's Blade
document_data.mainbody: '''''The Shadow's Blade''''' was a unique [[enchanted]] [[shortsword]] also known as a ''short sword of backstabbing''.
document_data.Powers: ''The Shadow's Blade'' possessed a powerful ''+3'' enchantment that made the sword more deadly and helped to guide the wielder's arm towards the target.
document_data.History:
''The Shadow's Blade'' was a weapon specifically designed to be used by [[assassin]]s and was in high demand among those who used blades to settle differences. Many of the sword's owners did not keep it for very long. In the {{YearlinkName|1281}}, ''The Shadow's Blade'', the original or a replica, was wielded by [[Purvis]], an assassin who was hired by the speaker of [[Lonelywood]].

In the {{YearlinkName|1368}}, the weapon belonged to the assassin named [[Slythe]] who served the infamous [[Bhaalspawn]] [[Sarevok Anchev]] in the city of [[Baldur's Gate]]. Soon after, the sword fell into the hands of another Bhaalspawnâ€”the thief [[Viekang]] in the town of [[Saradush]].
